description: This header file declares internal API functions for the Http Ato FxCat2 object within the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes function prototypes for creating code and name tables, and for retrieving atom codes and names.

methods.name: HttpAtoFxCat2CreateCodeTable
methods.description: Creates a code table for atom codes within the object.

methods.name: HttpAtoFxCat2CreateNameTable
methods.description: Creates a name table for atomic names within the object.

methods.name: HttpAtoFxCat2GetAtomCode
methods.description: Retrieves the atom code for a given name.

methods.name: HttpAtoFxCat2GetAtomName
methods.description: Retrieves the atom name for a given code.
